parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is a required user registration parameter

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Use token for API validation using a mobile user permission to access the shop details and just query it if token existed

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for APIs

response_fields.name: msg
response_fields.description: The content for an API request for error description

response_fields.name: shop_name
response_fields.description: The content of the shop name

response_fields.name: description
response_fields.description: The content of the shop description

response_fields.name: device_number
response_fields.description: The device-bound information for this shop. It must be unique. Max length: 80 chars
